description.narrative:
Objective
Long-term objectives and strategies of Social Enterprise are:
to open a bicycle service for population in Subotica to employ persons who are long term unemployed and hardly employable to promote a bicycle riding as a way of a transport in a city
Expected results
Bicycle service is working well A Lot of children goes to school with bikes A lot of adults goes to the job with bikes. Polution of the air is reduced Sustainability is achived Main activities
Preparation activities (in cooperation with the National Employment Agency of Serbia, department in Subotica and with the local Church we will found the persons who would like to participate in this project
Registering the services as a formal Social Enterprise Opening a service and promoting the services (through media, sport organizations, website and social networks), Every day activities – providing bicycle service activities for the local population,
Results achieved
New bicycle service is open and is operating as social enterprise
People are using bicycle service oportunities
People are in favor of using more healthy way of transpotrtation
Polution of the air is reduced
